Lucky me It's happened again I went out with you And lost one more friend I wanted to try it out I hoped for the best But when the moment came Our love failed the test It looks as if I am The one to blame once more It's because of me That you walked out my door

I wish I could show you What you mean to me But feelings are felt They're things you can't see Living up with you Was sometimes tough But now I find I don't see you enough Times growing up When we were young Remembering when We'd have so much fun To sum it all up I love you dear sis When you're not around You're constantly missed

Try and fail, try and fail How come I just can't prevail In a wolrd of run down schools Stupid books and teaching fools Places where real intelligence Is just pure coincidence Where the workplace is a rat race Always going at a fast pace No matter how hard I try I can't succeed and don't know why

In memory of you I've written some lines To reminiss On our happy times Days in the past When we had such fun Your old life is over But your new one's begun It's so very sad To see you go But we'll meet again This much I know

My brother has left To start anew And build a little home Yet I'm still here All by myself Jealous and alone So proud of him My parents are He's doing something good But when I try To do my thing I get misunderstood I've looked up to him For most of my life He sure has done alot One thing's for sure This thought endures My brother I am not

I thought I saw something In your face That spoke of a love true But my instincts They were misplaced I was wrong about you You chewed me up And spit me out Like tasteless bubble gum Now I see How you used me And left me feeling numb I've got a plan I'll take your things And throw them in the fire I don't want stuff Given from A vengefull, heartless liar

When I was a kid I lived on a farm I'd walk through the forest Or play in the barn When I was a kid I had a pet cat She'd sit in the sun Or play with a rat When I was a kid Everything was fun I'd just do whatever Without a reason When I was a kid I'd skip rocks on a stream I remember sometimes At night when I dream

Your oh so close to me, that I could touch But you don't know, that I want you so much I've known you for so long, but never said The things that I think, that go through my head I'm attracted to you, but you don't know When it comes to showing feelings, I'm slow If you really knew, how I'd care for you Your days of searching around would be through Seeing guys hurt you, makes me so upset If you were mine, I'd love you and protect No one would ever again, cause you pain I'd shelter you from, the storms and the rain I'd devote all of, my time just for you If you'll just tell me, that you want me too.

When I'm down You keep me there What a way To show you care I've helped you out And talked with you But that's all done I'm through with you I've taken away Your title as friend The mean things you did Will heal in the end I'm tired of having you Treat me like shit It's time for me now To get over it I'll survive on my own Starting today I'll do it because Who needs friends anyway

I once was in love Then my heart she broke And thoughts of my love lost Still linger like smoke My heart is now cold There's no warmth inside I've no one to turn to So in poems I'll hide My thoughts and emotions On this page are shown Writtings about How I'm always alone Could this be my fate Or my destiny To live my whole life With no one but me

As you sit in my cup Hot steaming black I'll tell you what I'll do I'll add some sugar Stir a bit Maybe a cream or two I like my coffee really strong It's double caffeine for me To not drink coffee Would just be wrong A form of blasphemy Coffee houses All over the world Are stores that sell my drug It's coffee for me All night and all day In my little coffee mug
You flow to me like Misty streams of fog at night Clouding my vision

Random colours of insanity Scrambled go through my brain One first hits another one Then neither are the same I think sometimes of green And other times it's red To think it's hard of other things They're stuck when in my head Mostly I'm pretty normal But then there's other times When these colours cloud my cranium I start to lose my mind Call me messed up, crazy, mad Or not right in the head I don't care, I've heard it before That's what my doctor said

When you're ready to go out Wearing your best dress And he says to you He'd rather just rest You're fooling yourself When you say that you love him And be always true Then he puts down his beer And says "sure me too" You're fooling yourself When you light all the candles And smell like perfume Then he says he'll watch football In another room You're fooling yourself When you say you want to part And find someone new Then you get back together Because he'll change for you You've fooled yourself

They do it out of concern When they ask me how I am But they can't see That inside of me Is a lonely bitter man I want them to help me out I want to feel all good But there's a problem here And it's this I fear I never do what I should

You never see it coming But you feel it in your spine A lover's touch can hurt so much But it might take a little time Be carefull how you hold That dagger that you grip If you don't know what you do It could hurt you if it slips Feelings can make you blind Words can leave you deaf When you get hurt inside your heart You don't have nothing left

Come with me To a place I know Where the trees grow tall and wide To reach this place You must walk slow And to stay you have to hide There's things out there That'll eat you up They'll do it from within They'll hang you high And bleed you dry They'll finish what you begin They'll make you hurt They'll make you cry They'll make you yell in pain They'll make you hurt And then once more And then once more again If I could rest Get a little sleep Things would be okay But they won't stop Tormenting me So things will stay this way

I need you all to myself I won't share you with anyone else If I bought a present for you Would you say you love me too I try to do the right thing I even bought you this ring If you won't be mine I'll ask one more time Then you'll see how much pain I can bring

I'm a loser to you You tell me so Each and every day Always taking time To put me down In brand new heartless ways You tell me that I will never Amount to very much I can't believe That my own dad Would want to hurt me so much You helped my mom To make the choice To take end life she had So memories I'll hold Cuz to me they're gold And I know that makes you mad You won't keep me down I'll rise to the top And show you how strong I am I feel sorry for you That you never knew How to be a real man

Why do you make it so easy For me to have it so bad You act like I don't understand And that's why I'm feeling so sad Abuse me, confuse me, be silent These are things you would do to me It doesn't matter to me anymore Cuz I'm begining to see I was never nothing to you Were you ever something to me So let me emplore, I don't want you no more I'm just gonna let these things be

The pain you caused It hurt me How could you just Desert me You left me standing By myself All alone with No one else Time and time I said I loved you When I proposed you said You'd be true You left me with a hole In my heart You were my life How can I restart You left and took my Will to live You'd always take but Never give It's sad to see I've Sunken so low And the reason you left I'll never know

I can't stand to look at you Cuz of what you did to me If all is fair in love and war I'm just a casualty You acted like you liked me When we were still a pair You don't know how hard it is To act like I don't care My best friend is yours too I can't talk with her now You hurt me so, but now I know You find it fun somehow

When I came in the house today You captured me with your stare Your beautiful face, your deep dark eyes Your lovely flowing hair Could it be That you love me Just the way I am I never feel I'm good for you But I try the best I can I love you I'll give to you The Moon, the stars, the Sun Our love will be Just the way It was when it begun Stay with me Forever dear Come whatever may And capture me With your stare The way you did today

If you could talk Would you tell me What it's like to fly Soaring over Trees so green Up into the sky Could you teach me To fly like you To spread my arms and go It would be nice But you and I Both know it ain't so

The anger inside me is like a time bomb ready to blow Things around me often upset me but I don't let it show I make them think that I'm okay, that everything is great I can't let them know, that I could go, from holding all this hate It's dangerous to know me, to know why I act like I do Just like a time bomb takes those around with it When I go I'll take you too

Why do you cover the ground like this With sheets of perfect white You cover the trees and telephone poles For days on end and night Why do you do the things you do Why do you shorten the days It doesn't matter, but this is true You'll die come summer days Your ice will melt and flood the streets It's the end of you I fear But you'll hide yourself away from us And come again next year

I was raised in a strange place By people I didn't know Only fed with water And chemicals to grow People walk by, to take a look at me But the sign says "just for show" So they'll stare a bit, and say "how nice" And then they'll slowly go They put me on sale, to get rid of me The day had finaly come I was so happy, I blossomed with joy This was my moment in the sun A man walked by, I caught his eye He paid and took me that day We went to a house, I met a strange lady And to her he gave me away

Silence is golden to the ear For if there's no bad news There's nothing to fear Ignorance of danger, conspiracy The proof is before you But you cannot see You have shut your eyes Don't want to look At what has been taken And what has been took You've shut yourself off From what's all around Your mind is lost And still hasn't been found

The pain in my life Is drawing me in Reduced to a life Of nothing but sin Intoxication Immoral deeds Evil feeds evil I give what it needs Immersed in depression No hope left for I The onslaught is constant But I will defy I am not what they say I believe in fate I'm destined for greatness But now I just wait I won't rush my future It will come one day I won't have to summon I won't have to pray And when that day comes I'll rejoice with joy For the thing I've awaited Since I was a boy So now I'll just deal with Things that come my way Fate is one such thing The world can't take away

All by myself no one but me I'm not depressed I'm very happy Don't have a girl To worry about I can stay in Or I can go out No one to tell me What I have to do No one to hurt me Or make me feel blue I can get drunk And stumble and fall Go buy some more beer And then drink them all And when I'm done I'll go to the bar I can call a taxi If it is too far Walk through the doors Scope out the crowd Sometimes it's quiet But usually loud I'll talk with the girls Till the night does end Maybe I'll meet one In whom I can depend

Eyes half closed Walking slow To my first class I shall now go Six cups of coffee I must drink So that I can At least think Time ticks by I sit and write Classroom noises And too bright lights Nagging teacher underpaid Must be years Since she's been laid Concentration I don't possess I dream of sleep I must confess Time to go Class is done Time to leave This asylum

Persecuted for no fault of my own How can I respect the justice you've shown Taken away my ability My vision is clear, now I see You attack those who can't defend When you're the one whose help you should lend I hate you for the things you do Can't you see I'm a person too You think that you're above the law But your person is one big flaw If I had the power to do I'd call up a friend or two Hunt you down and hang you high So that we could see eye to eye But my mind doesn't work that way So with these last words I'll say Your whole system is one big flop I hate you so much you fucking cop

The words that my pen scribbles on the page Won't necessarily get better with age The style they've been written in Colour, topic, length, can't even begin To capture the emotion I wanted to convey The page is my table the words are my clay Now if only they'd speak what I wanted to them to say

My life is what it is Not what it should be Going through each day Melodramatically I was born to do Much more than I have done Gaining knowledge bit by bit Trying new things one by one Each new day hold new things That I've not seen before If they can't hold my attention In time I start to bore My life is like a guitar That's slightly out of key To some it might sound quite bad But it sounds just fine to me
Like the mist You came to me softly Obscurring all my worries And hidding all my fears from sight But since you've left You've taken half of me I feel like the day without night
We're overrun by our government We're defined by our environment We must stop and take a stand We want reform in our homeland We can't expect our leaders to care They don't even know what's fair

I don't dress this way for some attention I don't act this way due to depression I'm not like this cuz it's cool now I just relate to this lifestyle somehow I've been this way for a long time This is the way that my soul shines

Take the good things as they come Brush the bad ones off like flies I don't care bout shit no more Fuck the world and all its lies I pay no mind to what you say You can think whatever you may But if you say I'm full of shit Show me something to prove it
Does a rose know it's beautifull? Does a turtle know it's slow? How do I know, when I'm in love the time to tell her so?

I've had it to hear I'm sick of it all I feel like a tree Ready to fall The world's cut away At me for so long It's hard to stand up To something so strong I'm starting to break Soon I'll fall to the ground If no one is there Will I still make a sound

urlLink GINGER 1989 - 2004 Sadly I am writing this post in memory of our beloved 15 year old cat Ginger who has recently left our world for a better place. Ginger was quite possibly the nicest, most gentle, friendly and easy going feline I have ever known. Ginger was diagnosed earlier in her life with an incurable liver disease but lived out many fine years as a loving and faithful cat. Ginger survived an extended separation from my girlfriend's loving care and was thankfully rejoined due to her inplanted ID tag. In her last days Ginger's health took a sudden and unexpected plunge. Ginger was not herself anymore. She was no longer eating, drinking, cleaning herself, and could barely stager a few sideway paces before laying back down again where she would lie moving her head every so ofter while she tried unsuccessfully to fall asleep. Her vision was extremely questionable, and this normaly very vocal cat was only able to muster up painful moans. After examining Ginger at the animal hospital the Vet said that her gums were very white which is a bad sign of health, she also said Ginger was very weak and in alot of pain. Ginger was given an overdose of medicine which caused her to doze off peacefully and not have to suffer anymore. I still think of Ginger daily and we all miss her company very much and wish she was still here with us. Brought to you by HaKx

Sept Isles, Quebec, CAN - 3 months after I was born Great Falls, Montana, USA - 6 years C.F.B. Petawawa, Ontario, CAN - 3 years Pembroke, Ontario, CAN - 4 years Anchorage, Alaska, USA - 4 years Rockliff A.F.B., Ottawa, Ontario, CAN - 1 year Aylmer, Quebec, CAN - 5 years Ottawa, Ontario, CAN - 4 years and counting

For years I've only ever used the internet to take away stuff from it, but now I will actaully put information (not necessarily usefull) out on the internet. I can blog as an outlet to speak and be heard (maybe).
Just like the title says, it's my very first post. More to come ;)

urlLink My girlfriend and I rescued a little kitty from the pet store yesterday. He's about 8 weeks old and really tiny. We haven't given him a name yet. Our other older female cat hasn't attacked him but does hiss and growl a little when he goes near her, but I think they'll get along fine eventually. Brought to you by HaKx
Below are some Internet quizzes I took to pass the time while I had nothing to do at work.

You're addicted to..... Alcohol! Mmmmmmm, Mmmmmm, Bitch! I like you, alcohol is one of the better things to be addicted to. The only bad part is it makes you feel like doing nothing and the next morning you get a terrible hangover. urlLink What are you addicted to? (pics!) brought to you by urlLink Quizilla

Grunge! You're all about the music and would even turn your back on fame just to stay true to your roots... You reached your high in the early '90s, but you're still making some good stuff! Keep rocking! urlLink What genre of rock are you? brought to you by urlLink Quizilla
Hercules urlLink ?? Which Of The Greek Gods Are You ?? brought to you by urlLink Quizilla

You are Xuan Wu! Mythological background: Because the turtle has a thick, solid shell that serves as protection - this animal is associated with stability. You enjoy intellectual pursuits. Also, in Feng Shui (the Chinese myths behind choosing a house), the black turtle's solidity is used to protect from cold northern winds. urlLink Which Chinese Mythological Being Are You? brought to you by urlLink Quizilla
Nihilist Bear urlLink Which Dysfunctional Care Bear Are You? brought to you by urlLink Quizilla
Fight Club! urlLink What movie Do you Belong in?(many different outcomes!) brought to you by urlLink Quizilla

My girlfriend and I have moved into a nice little apartment in downtown Ottawa, right by everything like the parliament buildings, rideau center, the market, elgin street. It's right beside the rideau canal and within walking distance of my work. And the bonus is we've moved in just before Canada day (July 1st for all you non-Canadians) so we can just walk to the festivities and not worry about parking or how we're gonna get home after drinking too much. For those of you not lucky enough to be able to join us on the hill, you can still watch either on T.V. or via urlLink the live hill-cam from parliament hill .

First urlLink Nicholas Berg , and now urlLink Paul Johnson . 2 men who were just doing their jobs. My heart goes out to the families of the 2 American civillians who were taken hostage and beheaded by heartless Al-Qaeda bastards. What kind of mindset could you possibly have to think that you are justified to cut off someone's head? These poor, sad, pathetic, loathsome, worthless, oxygen wasting fuckers really bother me. I think we should find the disgusting pukes who did this and go old testament on them, and do an eye for an eye, and cut off their worthless heads. I know that might take us down to their level but it's the only thing I can think of that is a fitting enough punishment.

I've recently started a new Blog dedicated to my poetry and writtings. You can find it at urlLink http://hakxpoetry.blogspot.com if anyone cares to take a look at it. Your comments are welcome as always.

Remember growing up and watching cartoons on saturday mornings? Now we have The Cartoon Network 24 hours a day. Remember playing good guys and bad guys outside with your friends? Now we have bloody first person shooter video games. Remember taking a trip to the beach and slpashing in the waves? Now we have indoor wave pools in the city. Remember when you wanted to see a new movie you had to go to the theater? Now we can download the movie off the internet, sometimes before the movie even gets to the theater. Remeber when you could go to the movies for $5.00? Now it costs over $25.00 for two people, not including popcorn and drinks. Remember when gas cost under 50 cents? Now we're lucky if it's under $1.

urlLink STANLEY CUP FINALS - GAME 7 CALGARY vs TAMPA BAY Tonight it all comes down to the final and all important deciding game 7 of the stanley cup finals. Both teams are extremely talented and are thirsty to drink from the cup. Each team will undoubtedly give it their all and let it all hang out. Things are shaping up to be an excellent hockey game and you can bet your puck that I'll be watching. Brought to you by HaKx

urlLink Two of the most famous T.V. cars ever! The General Lee and Kit from Knight Rider. On one hand you had 2 back woods red neck brothers driving a souped up charger running from the law screaming YEHAA!! as they drove "as the crow flies". And on the other hand you had a nomad lady killer driving a talking car with turbo boost and an ejection seat. If I was given the choice of either car it would be a very tough decision. Brought to you by HaKx
